PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12572022-11-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Iran) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (IRAN) REGULATIONS in order to add four (4) individuals and five (5) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0248 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Iran) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (IRAN) REGULATIONS in order to add four (4) individuals and five (5) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
